prompt_base: muscular middle-aged man, deeply tanned skin, large voluminous black afro hairstyle, thick black horseshoe mustache, wearing a white cape over a brown martial arts gi, boisterous expression
feature_prompt: extreme detailed skin wrinkles and pores, visible chest hair texture, realistic hair strands in afro, textured fabric on cape and gi
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, illustration, plastic texture, smooth skin, bald, helmet hair, low quality, blurred mustache
